snippet: In the 1990s, Rev. Louie Giglio referred in a sermon to the “aggressive agenda’' of the gay rights movement, and advocated “the healing power of Jesus” as “the only way out of a homosexual lifestyle.”
abstract: In the 1990s, Rev. Louie Giglio referred in a sermon to the “aggressive agenda’' of the gay rights movement, and advocated “the healing power of Jesus” as “the only way out of a homosexual lifestyle.”

headline.main: Minister's Comments on Gay Rights Raise Questions on Role in Inauguration
